overview: “Prior to his current position, Weissenborn served as SPTIâ€™s vice president, global advertising sales, international networks, since 2004. Before that, he had been a sales, marketing and revenue consultant for the international networks group where he led a review of the ad sales and marketing operations of SPTIâ€™s SET, MAX and AXN networks in India. Weissenborn has held positions at eMachines, Inc. in Pasadena, California from 1999 to 2001 where he was vice president, internet group, and Univision in Los Angeles from 1998 to 1999 where he was vice president, marketing and sales development. From 1992 to 1998, Weissenborn held various positions at Comedy Centralâ€™s Los Angeles office, including account manager (1992-1995), director, advertising sales, western region (1995-1998), rising to vice president, advertising sales, western region in 1998. Prior to Comedy Central, Weissenborn was an account executive, national spot representative, for Harrington, Righter and Parsons in Chicago and San Francisco.” (Source: Sony Pictures)

relationships.title: SVP, Digital Media and Global Advertising Sales
